experiences.description:
- Assisted users on site or remotely
- Information technology park management
- Remote phone control by Bomgar
- Windows 10, Active Directory, Hardware management
- Managed a complete IT park with 3 level 2 colleagues and a level 3 supervisor
- IAM and Active Directory profile creation on Azure portal
- VPN pulse secure, Ticket tool ServiceNow
- Managed content on social networks to avoid sensitive, violent, and other prohibitions by the client

- Identity and Access Management for the European Investment Bank
- Profile creation, distribution list setup, shared mailbox setup, and granting access following ITSM protocols
- Managed external emails and their legitimacy
- Ticket tool Smart IT

- Assisted users with remote control tools and elevations
- Technical support for client hardware or software via chat (teams), email, remote phone control by Teamviewer
- Account reset and assistance for application users (stores) in all of France
- Managed a complete IT park with 2 level 2 colleagues and a level 3 supervisor
- IAM and Active Directory admin rights and profile creation on Azure portal
- Work tool on SmartIT, VPN pulse secure

- Provided technical service for Bosch workshops, identifying malfunctions and errors for service technicians
- Offered post-sale service of specific software diagnostics
- Used DDM and ESI Tronic for diagnostics, CDB for ticket management, Genesys for phone, and MS Office for other channels

- Assisted users remotely
- Technical support via chat, email, phone remote control by Bomgar
- Supported Office 365, IAM, Lotus Notes, Adobe, TeamCenter, Ariane, Sharepoint, Windows 7/10, Showbiz, Baan, Active Directory
- Escalation to Level 3
- Profile creation and admin rights through IAM and Active Directory on Azure portal
- Utilized Citrix virtual machine
- Level 2 support on Microsoft Azure console
- Created Skype profiles, level 1 assistance, restored SharePoint and shared files
- Updated knowledge database, printer connectivity reactivation, and managed level 2 phone line

- Assisted users remotely
- Technical support via chat, email, phone remote control by Bomgar
- Supported Office 365, Adobe, TeamCenter, Ariane, Sharepoint, Windows 7/10, and Active Directory
